meanings.definition: A person who is paralyzed in all four limbs and typically has limited or no movement below the neck.
meanings.sent1: Quadriplegics require specialized care to assist with their daily activities.
meanings.sent2: The hospital has a dedicated unit for quadriplegics to receive treatment and rehabilitation.
meanings.sent3: Why did the quadriplegics refuse to play hide-and-seek? Because they couldn't run to hide!
meanings.sent4: The quadriplegics' spirits soared like birds, even though their bodies were grounded.
meanings.sent5: The image of quadriplegics bravely facing each day is truly inspiring.

meanings.definition: The condition of being quadriplegic, characterized by paralysis in all four limbs.
meanings.sent1: Understanding the challenges of quadriplegics is important for providing proper support.
meanings.sent2: Quadriplegics often rely on assistive devices to help with their mobility.
meanings.sent3: The quadriplegics' dance troupe wowed the audience with their unique choreography.
meanings.sent4: In the world of possibilities, the quadriplegics' determination shone like a beacon.
meanings.sent5: The resilience of quadriplegics serves as a testament to the strength of the human spirit.
